data.convo: Can you change American dollars into French francs . Yes . How much do you want ? Fifty dollars . What is the exchange rate today ? One dollar to five franc . Is that alright ? Yes , please . and you can cash my travelers check . Can ’ t you ? Of course we can . I won ’ t to be here tomorrow . What are you business hours ? 10 o ’ clock in the morning to 2 o ’ clock in the afternoon . Thank you . Not at all .
